https://tmrev.io/movie/403667-Adios amigos 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6O62druhORafXGCEriTUIIrFmp9.jpg Three young guys with disabilities want to go on a party holiday in Salou, just as their friends do. Only their parents block this idea. But then a caretaker, found on the internet, makes the dream possible. Adios Amigos is a remake of the Belgium movie Hasta La Vista. Adios amigos
